segments.text: Let's have a look . What is this ? Where are all the grades ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's in the third grade Sam ! You see under each subject that he is being taught in school , he receives a mark from one to three . A one means his achievement or work is excellent . Here in Science for example he got a two , which means its satisfactory .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about here in physical education ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He got a three here which means it's unsatisfactory . We should work on that with him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So confusing ! In my day we got an A or B if we were doing well and if we failed an exam we would get an F !
segments.speaker: S2
